A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
There are too many negatives to list here. From the terrible script to the acting to the unnecessary scenes and\, as a result\, lack of character development\, it was shocking. All they had to do was follow Rogue One's lead!

2 stars for the visuals. Basically a bunch of things happened\, which kept me mildly interested apart for some painfully slow scenes with poor script\, and then the movie ended. You're left with a hollow feeling wondering how they'd managed to produce such a poor result. 

Everything that Rogue One got right\, is everything The Last Jedi got wrong. A weak and corny version of Star Wars that should never have been released in its  current form.

D Gleeson for worst acting in a Star Wars movie? He's definitely up there.
